items.answer: We accommodate both small and large orders, with flexible manufacturing capabilities ranging from prototype to mass production runs.
items.question: What is your minimum order quantity?

items.answer: We maintain ISO 9001:2015 certification and have specialized aerospace and automotive industry quality standards compliance.
items.question: What quality certifications do you have?

items.answer: Standard lead times range from 2-6 weeks depending on component complexity and order volume. Rush orders available for urgent requirements.
items.question: What are your typical production lead times?

items.answer: Yes, we specialize in custom manufacturing with advanced CNC machining and precision engineering capabilities for unique component requirements.
items.question: Can you produce custom precision components?

items.answer: We primarily work with brass, but also offer capabilities in copper alloys, aluminum, and select stainless steel components.

aboutusintro.title: About Shiv Brass
aboutusintro.subtitle: Three Decades of Manufacturing Excellence and Innovation
aboutusintro.description: Founded in 1993, Shiv Brass has grown from a small workshop to a leading precision component manufacturer. We combine traditional craftsmanship with modern technology to deliver exceptional brass components worldwide.

items.name: Michael Rodriguez
items.content: Shiv Brass consistently delivers high-quality precision components that meet our stringent automotive engineering requirements.

items.name: Sarah Thompson
items.content: Exceptional precision and reliability. Shiv Brass has been our trusted manufacturing partner for complex aerospace components.
